column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I'm not from Chicago but I know they're pretty big on their steakhouses. A couple of friends and I were a little torn between Bavettes and Kinzie
column2: and I'm so glad we chose this place. Right when you walk in the vibes are really nice
column3: pretty dim like most steakhouses but also a nice modern feel. We were seated downstairs where there were huge booths and a center area with some couches and chairs.
